Articles.Content:
Helllooooo fellow visitors of the forums! I've been getting into t-shirt design lately and I was thinking if you guys and girls could possibly give me some ksp ideas for t-shirts? I will be setting up two stores, on for ksp and one for other sorts of t-shirts =D I also take in ANY kind of requests people may have I really don't mind

Information:

I am 15 years old and male, looking to raise $2000 to

buy parts for my own computer! And really need some

money so I can obviously build the computer... But

$2000 dollars is a lot for a 15 year old boy to try and get,

So that is why i've set my mind on t-shirt design to gain

money slowly (if all goes well fast).

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Before I give out links I need to know if I can put the word(s) "KSP" on t-shirts.

Edited August 9, 2013 by SUPERVIP101
I don't think making those KSP T-Shirts is legal, have you checked with SQUAD to get permission?

**** sorry the website is buggy and wont let me change stuff.. im trying to edit it all as fast as i can.

------------------------------------

Fixed, should be only 1 t-shirt on there for now, Ill had more tomorrow or something..

Edited August 9, 2013 by SUPERVIP101
Yeah, you should probably get permission for this sort of thing. If you didn't, expect the copyright lawyers to descend in 3... 2...
I did say i fixed it, it should be all gone?
wuuuuuut where!!?!?! I deleted the things already! The only stuff im selling is the things that i made... excuse the crappy grammar.

i smell lawsuit

Whoa you need 2k for a gaming Pc??? 1k is plenty for a descent comp that can run pretty much everything at atleast medium. (My comp costs 600 although planning to spend another 140.)

P.S This reeks of lawsuit/copyright Ksp T - shirts already exist made by squad so I highly doubt you would get a go ahead from them.
I messaged them, And I dont see any problem going on.... I mean like I made the t-shirts my self. I'm young and kinda don't understand much of what's wrong. Is it just the word "KSP" ??

Is it just the word "KSP" ??

The problem is monetizing someone elses work. Wait for a message back, see what you can do.
Yup, it is because using someone else's publicity for your gain.
Ah ok, Thanks. Do you know where I can send them a message? I can't seem to find where I can contact them direct. And for some reason my emails wont send to them..

Hello buddy ...

Yea, what you're trying to do is against the law...

But maybe you could get squad permission to do that , be sure to send them a message.

Suggestion: Why not sell t-shirts with your own creations ? I'm sure you will not have problems

Yeah I'm terrible with ideas ,': / I love ksp with all my heart and I'm waiting on a message from SQUAD to get permission. If they say no I'm going to need some help getting ideas and money together thanks for telling me though

A good way to get money is doing what I do. The stuff people buy in stores for computers is tripled in price. If you can get a 800$ loan from anyone you know and throw a computer together that is decent and sell it for around 200 less than the store one with the same specs and kijiji it you can make around 600$ a computer. If you can't get a loan you can always get a paper route for a few months.

If I knew how to build computers for one >_> and I live in Canada... (from the UK) and so yeah paper is off the job since its already taken anyway... but thanks though... i still need some more ideas....
Get yourself a part-time job dude Save every cent until you get what you need Good luck!
Thanks lol, I'm doing my best to get money.. And since I've been talking to my dad a lot about building computers he seems that he will be helping me get the parts "You got to earn them first"
